title: para dEvataiyE
sahitya:
para dEvataiyE karuNai sheivAyE parama pAvani tuLasI tAyE


anupallavi

  varaguNa jAlE mangaLa mUlE bAlE emai paripAli sushIlE


caraNam    kamazh maNamum unadu melliya mEniyum kaNDu mukundan unai shiram ERkoNDAn
amalaiyunnAlE satya bhAmai munnAlE annAL rukmiNi pandayam venrAL
